name: Liberty top in Capel Red
description: This beautiful top is perfect for autumn. Shell button detailing at the front and a double panelled front for a luxury feel.

name: Liberty print Flower top
description:
This gorgeous top an be worn from now through to spring and beyond. It has beautiful shell buttons detailing at the back, and  a double panel giving a luxury feel. 

Liberty 100% cotton with 100% cotton lining.

name: Liberty print Kimono Wrap dress in Wiltshire Blue
description:
Our classic wrap dress, inspired by Japanese kimono designs, with a subtle thread running down the back to symbolise love for a child. 

This gorgeous dress layers beautifully over navy leggings.

name: Michiko Kimono Dress in Liberty print Cherry
description:
Our collection's signature style, the Michiko, is a kimono-based design, made in England using Liberty® Art Fabrics.  

The innovative wrap-design allows the Michiko to grow with the child, giving years of wear as a dress and then many more as a top, season after season. 

Made from 100% softest Liberty® Tana Lawn cotton print fabric - shown here in the vibrant Cherry print that just glows with warmth. 

Made in England

Machine wash at 40 degrees

Matching Bib and Bloomers also available. 


Help end child hunger! £4 from the sale of this item is paid to Action Against Hunger UK, registered charity number 1047501.

name: Iroka Liberty print top in Mitsi pink
description:
This stunning top with subtle detailing is bound to brighten up your day. From the delicate flutter sleeves to the stitching detailing on the oversized hem and neckline, this Iroka top is an object of beauty. (Iroka means loveliness in Japanese)

Cut by hand in England.

Machine washable, as it is made from 100% exquisite Liberty print Tana Lawn cotton. 

Matching shorts, bib and hairband available. 

Any items can be made in other sizes if they are out of stock- just email us at info@michikoandme.com !

name: Michiko Kimono Dress in Liberty print Fairford
description:
Our collection's signature style, the Michiko, is a kimono-based design, made in England using Liberty® Art Fabrics. As stylish as it is practical every little girl will want to be a Michiko girl – a beautiful and wise child. 

The innovative wrap-design allows the Michiko to grow with the child, giving years of wear as a dress and then many more as a top, season after season. 

Made from 100% softest Liberty® Tana Lawn cotton print fabric - shown here on the left in a quintessential ditsy print that just sings of running through fields of wild flowers. 

Made in England

Machine wash at 40 degrees

Matching Bib and Bloomers also available.

name: Baby Kimono Top in Liberty print Powell for Boys and Girls
description:
A gorgeous intricate cat design - suitable for boys and girls. 

An inner popper and side tie mean nothing can interfere with the important tasks of tummy time or cooing.

Made in England

Wash at 40 degrees.

LIMITED EDITION

name: Michiko Dress in Liberty print Umbel
description:
Our collection's signature style, the Michiko, is a kimono-based design, made in England using Liberty® Art Fabrics. 

The innovative wrap-design, shown here in Umbel, allows the Michiko to grow with the child, season after season. 

Made from 100% softest Liberty® Tana Lawn cotton print fabric - shown here in a gorgeous graphic print.

name: Cream bow on hairband
description:
The stunning show box is beautifully hand made in England and finishes off any outfit.

Made to order, so please allow a week or two for delivery.

name: Liberty print Michiko Kimono wrap dress in Mitsi Blue
description:
In this gorgeous print that manages to combine English tradition and Japanese design, we introduce our signature Michiko wrap dress to girls aged 5-8. 

Designed to grow with the child. 

Each one is cut by hand in our London studio.

Made of 100% Liberty Tana Lawn for that touch of luxury. 

Machine washable.

name: Liberty print Iroka dress with flutter sleeves in Mitsi
description:
In a stunning petrol blue Liberty print with raspberry detail, the Iroka dress has beautifully designed flutter sleeves and an oriental neckline, with stitching detail on the neckline and deep hem detail. 

Each garment is lovingly cut by hand in the London studio, where it is then individually sewn by our seamstresses.

Larger sizes in ages 6- 7 and 7-8 for delivery in 2-3 weeks (as are sizes that are out of stock today)

100% cotton that feels like silk.

Machine washable

Made in Britain. 

(Gift set with hairband also available as shown in image)

name: Iroka Liberty print Top in Mitsi blue
description:
This stunning top with subtle detailing is bound to add some pint sized loveliness to your day. From the delicate flutter sleeves to the stitching detailing on the oversized hem and neckline, this Iroka top is an object of beauty. (Iroka means loveliness in Japanese)

Cut by hand in England.

Machine washable, as it is made from 100% exquisite Liberty print Tana Lawn cotton.

Matching shorts, bib and hairband available.

name: Bloomers in Liberty print Mirabelle
description:
The sweetest baby bloomers with elasticated waist and legs, and finished with a satin bow. The perfect match to our dresses and tops and ideal for those summer days when trousers are too hot. 

Made from 100% softest Liberty® Tana Lawn cotton print fabric. Shown here in Mirabelle to match the Mirabelle dress or top. A bib is also available in this print. 

Made in England

Machine wash at 40 degrees

name: Iroka hairband
description: Gorgeous hairband - that also goes beautifully with the Iroka dress and bubble shorts

name: Bib in Liberty print Fairford
description:

Made from 100% softest Liberty® Tana Lawn cotton print fabric and fully lined with baby soft cream jersey made from 100% cotton.

Made in England

Machine wash at 40 degrees

description: These adorable bubble shorts are just delightful. Designed to last two summers, they are cut long to fit on the knee for the first year, whilst the elasticated waist allows enough stretch for a shorter pair in the next summer. Possibly our favourite ...
